intro: Kopsia arenaria f. ionantha, commonly known as the sand dune kopsia, is a rare and specialized plant adapted to coastal environments. It thrives in sandy soils and is often found in dune ecosystems along the Atlantic and Gulf coasts of the United States. The plant has small, narrow leaves and produces clusters of fragrant, white or pale yellow flowers. It is a perennial herb that relies on specific ecological conditions for survival. Due to habitat loss, it is considered endangered in many regions.
